Admission Exam Schedule

Important dates for the 2025-2026 academic session entrance examinations.

Pre-Admission Entrance Exam Dates

All applications and examinations are conducted through the official Jharkhand Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board (J.C.E.C.E.B.). Please adhere to the following deadlines.

Course Name Last Date for Online Application Entrance Exam Date
Auxiliary Nurses & Midwife (ANM) 10th July 2025 27th July 2025
General Nurses & Midwife (GNM) 10th July 2025 27th July 2025
B.Sc. Nursing 11th July 2025 26th July 2025

To apply, please visit the official examination board website:

Visit jceceb.jharkhand.gov.in
